borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.<br>
<p class="MsoNormal">The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.<br></p>

<p>The windows mentioned in the list below must not open below a height of 1.7 metres above the finished floor level of the room they serve. The windows shall be completely installed in accordance with these requirements before the development hereby approved is first occupied and shall thereafter be maintained and retained in accordance with these details.&nbsp;</p><p>List on windows this condition relates to:</p><ul><li>Ground floor window on the southern elevation serving bedroom 5&nbsp;</li><li>Roof / First floor windows on the northern elevation serving the hallway</li></ul>

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in complete accordance with the approved plans and drawings listed below, other than where those details are altered pursuant to conditions of this planning permission.<br></p><ul><li>Location Plan (planning portal reference PP-12761293v1
)</li><li>Block Plan&nbsp;</li><li>Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations (drawing number ALDB/02/D)</li></ul>

<p>The glazing in windows mentioned in the list below must&nbsp;achieve a minimum level of obscurity
equivalent to Pilkington Texture Glass Level 3 and shall not be openable below a height of 1.7 metres above the finished
floor level of the room they serve. Both requirements shall be completely installed in 
accordance with these requirements before the development hereby 
approved is first occupied and shall thereafter be maintained and 
retained in accordance with these details.&nbsp;</p><p>List on windows this condition relates to:</p><ul><li>Ground floor window on the eastern elevation serving a bathroom</li><li>Ground floor window on the southern elevation serving the staircase</li><li>Ground floor window on the southern elevation serving the ensuite</li><li>Ground floor window on the southern elevation serving the utility room&nbsp;</li><li>Roof / First floor windows on the southern elevation servicing the en-suite</li></ul>
description: Construction of a part two storey part single storey rear extension and the construction of side dormer extensions within the existing and extended roof and single storey side extension
